org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.util

Interface DeserializationSchema<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RawSchema, SimpleStringSchema

    public interface DeserializationSchema<T>
extends Serializable

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T deserialize(byte[] message)
      Deserializes the incoming data.
      boolean isEndOfStream(T nextElement)
      Method to decide whether the element signals the end of the stream.

    • Method Detail

      • deserialize

        T deserialize(byte[] message)
        Deserializes the incoming data.
        Parameters:
        message - The incoming message in a byte array
        Returns:
        The deserialized message in the required format.

      • isEndOfStream

        boolean isEndOfStream(T nextElement)
        Method to decide whether the element signals the end of the stream. If true is returned the element won't be emitted
        Parameters:
        nextElement - The element to test for end signal
        Returns:
        The end signal, if true the stream shuts down
